title: YouTube Video Dowloading & Quick Edits (Need Today)
snippet:
We have a collection of different videos on YouTube that we've uploaded to YouTube, but then lost the original file. We need someone to download these files from YouTube for us.

In addition some of the videos will need one minor edit where we'll need to trim the video part way through, and edit out the last part.

Please supply us with a fixed price for downloading 10 videos. If this goes well we'll have many more similar jobs for you. We need this doing today.
